# Value Model Previews

This directory contains generated HTML previews of Emergent's value models.

## Generated Files

| File | Description | Generated |
|------|-------------|-----------|
| *None yet* | Run the generator to create previews | - |

## How to Generate

Ask your AI assistant:

```
"Generate an HTML preview for the emergent-core value model"
```

Or generate all models:

```
"Generate an HTML portfolio preview for all Emergent value models"
```

## Sharing via Gist

1. Copy the contents of any `.html` file
2. Create a new GitHub Gist at https://gist.github.com
3. Paste content and name the file with `.html` extension
4. Click "Create public gist"
5. Share the raw URL for HTML preview
